Class SimpleDBRow

  • java.lang.Object

      • getMainKey

        public abstract int getMainKey()
        Gets main key for this row. Should return main key - should be unique if table has unique key. If table does not have unique key this may be any int.
        Returns:
        Main key value for this row.
